Title: ğŸŒ [ANN][CAER] ğŸŒ CAERUS CONNECTIONS - THE FUTURE OF HIRING IS HERE ğŸŒ
Body: Parts of Caerus are devoted towards free usage, and then there are parts that are devoted to Platinum services.  The free services (including anonymously uploading job search criteria, completing the Career Driver Compass, and searching for ideal candidates/employers) require no tokens.  In order to connect with each other, it will require an upgrade to a Platinum Membership, which will require a monthly fee of Caerus Tokens (1 Token per individual, per month and 3 Tokens per corporate recruiter, per month).  This model is designed to benefit the individuals looking for new employment, as it does not cost anything for them to put their information on the platform and be found by corporate recruiters looking to hire them.  Furthermore, with the inclusion of the Career Driver Compass, they will also got an added benefit of its insights to use in their daily working life.

Author: MorganBrowning
Title: ğŸŒ [ANN][CAER] ğŸŒ CAERUS CONNECTIONS - THE FUTURE OF HIRING IS HERE ğŸŒ
Body: Caerus Connections will sell the tokens to individuals who are looking to connect with each other through the Caerus platform (i.e. - Individual Job Seekers and Employment Recruiters).  It is a subscription model, where the token will give unlimited access, for one month, to message people that they find on the site and express interest in future employment and available positions.  Confidentiality will still be maintained during this process, as the message will go through a hidden email process.   Once an email is received by job seekers, then these individuals can choose as to whether they would like to respond back to this recruiter, and reveal their full identity to continue the job seeking conversation.  Because the job seeker has the ability to put more information on the platform that is pertinent to whether they are an ideal fit for a job, it will dramatically reduce the time and headaches involved in interviewing and selecting a candidate for an open position.

Body: Thanks for asking about that part, as it is really the key aspect of Caerus Connections. The Career Driver Compass is a 50 question survey developed by our Partners, Emergenetics International, with a psychometrically valid algorithm that rank orders 9 different work place motivators (see graphic below) to reveal what aspects of a job that each individual prefers.  Corporate recruiters match the ideal motivator set for their open positions, to the candidates that are available for the most ideal fit.  It is a strengths-based approach, and there is no right or wrong answer to the survey.  Emergenetics has used it for years, and it is a very accurate and valuable tool in the placing candidates who are most likely going to enjoy and succeed in their jobs.  A lot of times it is difficult to truly understand it until you try it.  Thus, for the next 24 hours, I will grant complimentary access to anyone who would like to experience the Career Driver Compass.  I will provide a one page summary of what the Career Driver Compass says about how you prefer to approach work, as well as a couple of paragraphs of interpretation.    If you are interested in taking the assessment (it takes about 10 minutes), please DM me on Telegram here:  https://t.me/MorganBrowning   Career Driver Compass Motivators:  https://i.imgur.com/HKzoz8Y.png?1

Body: There is a messaging protocol.  Caerus Connections will allow for recruiters to message individual candidates directly when they find a good match and want to pursue them directly. Body: We plan to partner with various companies that are looking for candidates and offer them enterprise packages to scale the use of the site.  These companies are very frustrated with the recruitment process because of the lack of clarity that individuals bring to the interview process.  Either their resumes are flawed or missing key pieces of information.  Furthermore, a job history is not enough information to accurately gauge whether a person is going to be a good fit in their job or not.  Alternatively, individuals can also use the platform itself, at a reasonable, monthly rate.

Author: MorganBrowning
Title: ğŸŒ [ANN][CAER] ğŸŒ CAERUS CONNECTIONS - THE FUTURE OF HIRING IS HERE ğŸŒ
Body: Although this can appear to look like monster, this is less of a job board and more of a community where interested individuals can market themselves as available for new opportunities in a more passive, confidential way than ever before.   I think of an individual that wants a new, better job and is bored at his/her current position.  They don't dislike their current role, but would like to explore new avenues without committing to the idea of engaging an outside recruiter or responding to a job posting.  They would like to simply say that "I'm available, and, if you are willing to meet my terms, let's talk!"  Because the transaction is confidential, the individual is able to have more power over their career opportunities than with traditional job sites.  Furthermore, with the inclusion of a workplace motivators assessment, the individual can say exactly how they like to work.  So, for example, if a job requires a desire for structure, the workplace motivators assessment will help pinpoint if a candidate truly enjoys these activities.  It makes for a better, more targeted search for both the employer and job candidate.

Title: ğŸŒ [ANN][CAER] ğŸŒ CAERUS CONNECTIONS - THE FUTURE OF HIRING IS HERE ğŸŒ
Body: This is specifically for recruitment and job seeking.  HR is a big field, and we are looking at simplifying one of the most complex and difficult aspects of HR.  Companies spend billions on this each year in the US alone, and our site makes it easier for recruiters to pinpoint the ideal talent and for job seekers to market themselves in a complete, secure manner.  Overall, the key aspects are such:  1)  Complete - Job seekers can post more information than just their work history to the site (e.g. - desired job duties, salary requirements, willingness to relocate, personal statements, etc).  Furthermore, included is a 9 factor, personal driver compass that highlights what job aspects a candidate likes to do and what drives them at work.  2)  Confidential - Job seekers retain their anonymity throughout the process.  Only when a candidate is contacted, through email, by a potential employer, does teh candidate choose whether to reveal their identity.  3)  Targeted Searching - Searches can pinpoint any of these factors that are important for an individuals success on the job.

Title: ğŸŒ [ANN][CAER] ğŸŒ CAERUS CONNECTIONS - THE FUTURE OF HIRING IS HERE ğŸŒ
Body: While verifying someone's talents is a difficult process, we are including a Personal Driver Compass on the application.  This is a 50 question survey that is based on psychometrics that analyzes how a person prefers to approach a job.  These factors are all preference-based (e.g. Desire for Structure, Enjoys Problem Solving, Willingness to Change, etc.), so there is no right or wrong answer.  By knowing a person's motivators, you can ensure that you are matching their preferences with the aspect of the job.  For example, if you were hiring for a job where the task requires a person to sit at a desk all day and edit spreadsheets for content accuracy, you would want to hire a person that is motivated by a Need to be Perfect (one of the factors that we can measure).  If you wanted someone to be more of an outside sales person and meet with clients and prospects all day, you would almost certainly want this person to be motivated by Close Personal Relationships (Another factor we can measure).  We have been using the personal driver compass for several years, and it greatly improves the effectiveness of matching the right person for the needs of the job.
